Articles.Content:
I want to know if there is a mod for 1.0X to allow for a plume around the engine? I know about realism overhaul, but I have an un-RO version (1.04) and would like to know if there is a plume mod for it.

Thank you.

I posted this in the other thread you started, but you could try:

Engine Lighting: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121987-1-0-2-Engine-Lighting-(1-3-5)-The-IVA-Update-(16-June](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121987-1-0-2-Engine-Lighting-%281-3-5%29-The-IVA-Update-%2816-June))

HotRockets: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65754-HotRockets!-Particle-FX-Replacement-Tutorial](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65754-HotRockets!-Particle-FX-Replacement-Tutorial)
